data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3756877,"name":"Sparx","username":"Sparx","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/sparx/{size}/246676_2.png","created_at":"2025-10-07T10:49:00.318Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eHey there!\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eWe have a competition tomorrow and we have a question. We use a localization that uses two MT2 cameras which we feed the gyro’s yaw. Our robot’s forward is the battery and we start a game with our manipulator to the reef, the manipulator is on the other side of the robot - 180 degrees to the battery. In the start of a game we were wondering how to reset the gyro based on the alliances. In the blue one, we reset it to 0 with the battery facing the red alliance and then we rotate the robot. Is that right? We didn’t test out the red alliance, how to reset the gyro there?\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":2,"updated_at":"2025-10-07T10:49:00.318Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":7,"reads":102,"readers_count":101,"score":55.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":506940,"topic_slug":"gyro-reset-in-qual","display_username":"Sparx","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":71823,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/gyro-reset-in-qual/506940/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3756887,"name":"Abdullah Khaled","username":"Squirre1Master","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/squirre1master/{size}/266909_2.png","created_at":"2025-10-07T12:24:58.615Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eAssuming you are using Pathplanner (idk abt Choreo), the robot’s pose is updated at the start of auto, regardless of what it thinks it is at.
